promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a chibi cute rare lizard dark-type pokemon with golden scales. It can be found in castle-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, dark or lizard. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Goldigon, a a chibi cute rare lizard dark-type pokemon. It can be found in castle-like environments It has the following abilities: Cragalanche. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "lizard", "dark" or "Goldigon". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of dark-type pokemon, lizard-like, rare, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, violet shadows
generatedDescription: This petite, enigmatic dweller thrives in majestic fortresses, using its Cragalanche ability to spark rock chaos. Devoted to their regal home, they remain unseen guardians.
